name: I Raised the Yandere Villain Empress
author: 笑脸
content: What is the experience of being betrayed and given to death by a disciple who has been raised with all his heart and soul? Exhausting his cultivation to finally obtain a chance to be reborn! In this life, he&#039s become corrupted. What&#039s the point of helping the heroine? Since I&#039ve come to become a villain, I&#039ll do it to the tee! As long as I&#039m strong enough, I&#039ll be able to win!
